definition[0]: to hit someone or something many times, in a way that hurts or damages them
example[1]: As a child, she was battered by her father.
example[2]: People were battering at the door.
example[3]: He was battered on the head with a cricket bat.
example[4]: She battered away at his chest with her fists.
example[5]: Armed police battered his door down.
definition[1]: a mixture of flour, eggs, milk etc, used in cooking and for making bread, cakes etc
definition[2]: the person who is trying to hit the ball in baseball
